statement.p: A manufacturer has just announced their new phone. The accounting department has determined that the cost to manufacturer the phone is \displaystyle{c}={33.67}{n}+{35768}, where \displaystyle{n} is the number of units manufactured and \displaystyle{c} is the resulting cost. The revenue equation is \displaystyle{c}={86.27}{n}. What is the break even point?

solution.p: The equations are already written for us, so we just need to solve the system. We can use substitution.
Substitute the expression \displaystyle{33.67}{n}+{35768} from the first equation into the second equation and solve for \displaystyle{n}.
